production_planner.title: Production Planner
production_planner.short: An app which streamlines sales-shipping with QuickBooks.
production_planner.long: This application streamlines the sales-to-shipping process by displaying orders from the QuickBooks database in a dynamic React interface, and managing large amounts of data effectively with a Django/MySQL backend.

amazon_checker.title: Amazon Checker
amazon_checker.short: A Python app to automate the Amazon order confirmation process.
amazon_checker.long: This Python app features a Tkinter GUI and uses specialized algorithms to interact with Amazon Vendor Central spreadsheets and speed up the order confirmation process.

kibbe_quiz.title: Kibbe Quiz
kibbe_quiz.short: A quiz that helps 5000+ users a month find their Kibbe body type.
kibbe_quiz.long: This JavaScript quiz has over 5000 monthly users, and features a custom algorithm to calculate the results, and presents the results in a comprehensive set of charts.

site_blocker.title: Chrome Site Blocker
site_blocker.short: A Chrome extension to block sites and improve productivity.
site_blocker.long: This Chrome browser extension uses the local storage feature to block chosen website addresses, and keep them blocked across all browser sessions for enhanced focus and productivity.

comment_analyzer.title: Comment Analyzer
comment_analyzer.short: A script to sort YouTube comments by sentiment.
comment_analyzer.long: This Python script intakes a YouTube video, and outputs the comments in an excel sheet, sorted by sentiment (i.e. Positive, Neutral, or Negative). It uses the 'Hugging Face' cardiffnlp roBERTA-base language model, which was trained on ~58 million tweets.

dg_draft.title: DG Draft
dg_draft.short: An app for playing fantasy disc golf.
dg_draft.long: A app brings fantasy sports to disc golf, allowing users to draft players and track their success in tournaments. It features secure login, user points tracking, and interactive leaderboards. Built with Rails, React, and PostgreSQL, and hosted on Heroku.

boilerplate_gateway.title: Boilerplate Gateway
boilerplate_gateway.short: An app to automate access to private GitHub repositories.
boilerplate_gateway.long: The Boilerplate Access Gateway is a Next.js application that automates access to boilerplate code repositories upon purchase via Gumroad. It instantly connects buyers to private GitHub repositories, streamlining setup with Heroku for continuous deployment.
